title: Guarana Chili Boost Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE LIQUORICE MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Introducing Guarana Chili Boost Nicotine Pouches by Ace a thrilling blend of incredibly soft nicotine pouches that provide a robust dose of chilli for an extra spicy kick, along with a long-lasting energy drink flavour. Experience the revitalising power of guarana, which has a naturally occurring caffeine level that keeps you feeling energised all day. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Drinks Flavour Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Energy Drink flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes 20MG Per Gram | 13MG Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for all environments MORE ABOUT LIQUORICE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Guarana Chilli Boost is an exhilarating blend of flavours contained in incredibly soft nicotine pouches. The addition of an intense chilli stimulation, which adds another level of spiciness to the experience, is what distinguishes Guarana Chilli Boost. The end product is a vibrant and tasty voyage where the powerful and fiery flavours of chilli perfectly meld with the energising qualities of guarana. MORE ABOUT ACE NICOTINE POUCHES Ace Nicotine Pouches are well known for having a higher nicotine concentration and pure flavour experiences. These tobacco-free pouches offer a revitalising and refreshing experience with flavours including Green Lemon, Cool Mint, and Licorice Mint. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine (mg/pouch): 13MG Nicotine (mg/Gram): 20MG Flavour Name: Liquorice Mint Flavour: Mint & Menthol Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
